Protocols/BBNativePlayerViewDelegate.htm.name: didTriggerCanPlay()
Protocols/BBNativePlayerViewDelegate.htm.abstract: The player is now ready to play.

Protocols/BBNativePlayerViewDelegate.htm.name: didTriggerDurationChange(duration:)
Protocols/BBNativePlayerViewDelegate.htm.abstract: The duration of the media in the player has changed

Protocols/BBNativePlayerViewDelegate.htm.name: didTriggerPlay()
Protocols/BBNativePlayerViewDelegate.htm.abstract: The player has executed a play command.

Protocols/BBNativePlayerViewDelegate.htm.name: didTriggerAutoPausePlay()
Protocols/BBNativePlayerViewDelegate.htm.abstract: The externally paused player is now playing.

Protocols/BBNativePlayerViewDelegate.htm.name: didTriggerSeeked(seekOffset:)
Protocols/BBNativePlayerViewDelegate.htm.abstract: The current playback position has changed by the player as a result of a seek action.

Protocols/BBNativePlayerViewDelegate.htm.name: didTriggerStall()
Protocols/BBNativePlayerViewDelegate.htm.abstract: The player is trying to fetch new media data, but is unable to retrieve it and continue playing.

Protocols/BBNativePlayerViewDelegate.htm.name: didTriggerMediaClipFailed()
Protocols/BBNativePlayerViewDelegate.htm.abstract: The player has encountered an error which prevents it from playing the content further.

Protocols/BBNativePlayerViewDelegate.htm.name: didTriggerAdError(error:)
Protocols/BBNativePlayerViewDelegate.htm.abstract: The advertisment provider encountered an error which prevents the ad from playing in the player.

Classes/BBNativePlayerView.html#/s:17BBN.name: delegate
Classes/BBNativePlayerView.html#/s:17BBN.abstract: The BBNativePlayerViewDelegate

Classes/BBNativePlayerView.html#/s:17BBN.name: presentModal(uiViewContoller:animated:)
Classes/BBNativePlayerView.html#/s:17BBN.abstract: Helper method to present the player as a full screen modal

Classes/BBNativePlayerView.html#/s:17BBN.name: load(contentId:contentIndicator:initiator:autoPlay:seekPosition:)
Classes/BBNativePlayerView.html#/s:17BBN.abstract: Play the loaded video.

Classes/BBNativePlayerView.html#/s:17BBN.name: play()
Classes/BBNativePlayerView.html#/s:17BBN.abstract: Play the loaded video.

Classes/BBNativePlayerView.html#/s:17BBN.name: pause()
Classes/BBNativePlayerView.html#/s:17BBN.abstract: Pause the video.

Classes/BBNativePlayerView.html#/s:17BBN.name: mute()
Classes/BBNativePlayerView.html#/s:17BBN.abstract: Mutes the sound of the video.

Classes/BBNativePlayerView.html#/s:17BBN.name: unmute()
Classes/BBNativePlayerView.html#/s:17BBN.abstract: Unmutes the sound of the video.

Classes/BBNativePlayerView.html#/s:17BBN.name: seek(positionInSeconds:)
Classes/BBNativePlayerView.html#/s:17BBN.abstract: Seek the video.

Classes/BBNativePlayerView.html#/s:17BBN.name: fullscreen()
Classes/BBNativePlayerView.html#/s:17BBN.abstract: Makes the player go fullscreen - Returns: none

Classes/BBNativePlayerView.html#/s:17BBN.name: retractFullscreen()
Classes/BBNativePlayerView.html#/s:17BBN.abstract: Retracts the player from fullscreen - Returns: none

Classes/BBNativePlayerView.html#/s:17BBN.name: setProgramVolume(volume:)
Classes/BBNativePlayerView.html#/s:17BBN.abstract: Set the volume for the main video.

Classes/BBNativePlayerView.html#/s:17BBN.name: setFitMode(fitMode:)
Classes/BBNativePlayerView.html#/s:17BBN.abstract: Change the way video is fitted inside the player.

Classes/BBNativePlayerView.html#/s:17BBN.name: getClipData()
Classes/BBNativePlayerView.html#/s:17BBN.abstract: Returns all the data for the current media clip.

Classes/BBNativePlayerView.html#/s:17BBN.name: getCurrentTime()
Classes/BBNativePlayerView.html#/s:17BBN.abstract: Returns the current time of the main clip.

Classes/BBNativePlayerView.html#/s:17BBN.name: getDeeplink()
Classes/BBNativePlayerView.html#/s:17BBN.abstract: Returns the deeplink of the current clip as specified in the VMS.

Classes/BBNativePlayerView.html#/s:17BBN.name: getDuration()
Classes/BBNativePlayerView.html#/s:17BBN.abstract: Returns the duration of the main clip.

Classes/BBNativePlayerView.html#/s:17BBN.name: getMuted()
Classes/BBNativePlayerView.html#/s:17BBN.abstract: Returns the current master muted state.

Classes/BBNativePlayerView.html#/s:17BBN.name: getPhase()
Classes/BBNativePlayerView.html#/s:17BBN.abstract: Returns the current phase of the player.

Classes/BBNativePlayerView.html#/s:17BBN.name: isPlaying()
Classes/BBNativePlayerView.html#/s:17BBN.abstract: Returns the playing state of the player.

Classes/BBNativePlayerView.html#/s:17BBN.name: getPlayoutData()
Classes/BBNativePlayerView.html#/s:17BBN.abstract: Returns all the playout settings from the OVP that is currently used.

Classes/BBNativePlayerView.html#/s:17BBN.name: getProjectData()
Classes/BBNativePlayerView.html#/s:17BBN.abstract: Returns all the project meta data. The operation of this method is similar to the getClipData() method, but returns a different set of data.

Classes/BBNativePlayerView.html#/s:17BBN.name: getThumbnailUrlString(clipId:width:height:)
Classes/BBNativePlayerView.html#/s:17BBN.abstract: Returns a URL to the thumbnail for the specified clip with specified dimensions.

Classes/BBNativePlayerView.html#/s:17BBN.name: getVolume()
Classes/BBNativePlayerView.html#/s:17BBN.abstract: Returns the current master volume. This method can be used when the volumechange event is fired to get the current player volume.

Classes/BBNativePlayerView.html.name: BBNativePlayerView
Classes/BBNativePlayerView.html.abstract: PlayerView used to play media from the Blue Billywig OVP
